summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganCeraVe Comforting Eye Makeup Remover with Hyaluronic Acid removes effectively the most stubborn eye makeup, including the waterproof mascara, without drying out and disrupting the delicate skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsCeraVe waterproof eye makeup remover instantly removes eye makeup including waterproof mascara without disrupting the delicate skin barrierGentle and Soothing makeup remover leaves skin feeling smooth, soothed, and clean without leaving a greasy residueThis liquid eye makeup remover feels gentle on lashesSuitable for sensitive skin & contact lens wearersOphthalmologist testedNon-comedogenicDeveloped with DermatologistsKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid helps retain skin's natural moisture3 Essential Ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) helps maintain the skin's natural barrierFormulated WithoutParabensFragranceAlcoholColorantsItem 2597413How To UseStep 1 - Shake well before applying CeraVe Comforting Eye Makeup RemoverStep 2 - Saturate a cotton padStep 3 - Hold pad over closed eye for a few secondsStep 4 - Gently wipe away to remove makeupStep 5 - Repeat steps 1-4, if necessaryTips for Removing Makeup:Choose your favorite CeraVe Makeup Remover such as Eye Makeup Remover, Cleansing Balm or Makeup Removing Plant-Based Wipes.Remove makeup as the first step of your routine; leaving makeup overnight can cause build-up of pore-clogging debris and bacteriaFind products with hydrating and skin-barrier reinforcing ingredients. When removing makeup, it is important that you restore the skin with ingredients like the three essential ceramides in CeraVe.Be careful with the delicate eye area - always check the label to determine if your makeup remover is formulated to remove eye makeup or face makeup.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Isohexadecane, Sorbitol, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Steareth-2, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Step 1 - Shake well before applying CeraVe Comforting Eye Makeup RemoverStep 2 - Saturate a cotton padStep 3 - Hold pad over closed eye for a few secondsStep 4 - Gently wipe away to remove makeupStep 5 - Repeat steps 1-4, if necessaryTips for Removing Makeup:Choose your favorite CeraVe Makeup Remover such as Eye Makeup Remover, Cleansing Balm or Makeup Removing Plant-Based Wipes.Remove makeup as the first step of your routine; leaving makeup overnight can cause build-up of pore-clogging debris and bacteriaFind products with hydrating and skin-barrier reinforcing ingredients. When removing makeup, it is important that you restore the skin with ingredients like the three essential ceramides in CeraVe.Be careful with the delicate eye area - always check the label to determine if your makeup remover is formulated to remove eye makeup or face makeup.

reviews.headline: BEST REMOVER I EVER USED
reviews.comments: I love this product!! I never had any makeup remover breakdown and remove waterproof mascara as well as this. I soak my towel, hold it over my eye while gently rubbing it, and within 30 seconds nearly all my eye makeup is gone. A few more swipes and perfection! Cannot recommend enough!

reviews.headline: I'm not sure if I would by this again.
reviews.comments: This eye makeup remover is super gentle on my skin. Love that's it's not irritating to my eyes. It's good at removing eyeshadow. However, I bought it hoping it would tackle waterproof mascara and it's minimally effective for that.

reviews.headline: Big no
reviews.comments: I do not recommend this at all. It made my vision blurry til the next morning after using it even after trying to wash the product out multiple times. And to get liquid eyeliner and eyelash glue off you have to scrub really hard, "comforting eye" is false advertising

reviews.headline: I'm returning this one
reviews.comments: This was not like a lotion. It was watery and oily.

reviews.headline: Will not clean off mascera
reviews.comments: Don't waste your money. It won't clean off mascera.

reviews.headline: Using my seond bottle
reviews.comments: This is so gentle on the eye area.  This removes mascara so easily, even waterproof.  I used another product for years and would have to wipe my eyes over and over to remove my mascara.  This product only takes a few swipes and mascara is gone.

reviews.headline: Great for sensative eyes
reviews.comments: This is easy on the skin around the eyes and even more importantly easy on the eyes, no burning and no hard rubbing to remove my black eyeliner and mascara no eyelashes falling off, this is one of my new favs!!

reviews.headline: BEST eye remover on the market
reviews.comments: I'm honestly so surprised this product has 4 stars.  I'm a little bit of a review snob and never buy a product that has less than 4.5 stars, but I bought this on a whim without looking at reviews.  I'm so glad I didn't look at reviews because this product is amazing and I have bought 2 bottles so far.  I don't wear mascara often but when I do it's usually waterproof or drugstore L'Or√©al.  It also works great for eyeliner and eyeshadow.  There's 0 scent which I prefer.  I put this product on a cotton ball and everything melts off super easy.  The ONLY issue I have with it is that if it gets in your eye and you're not super careful, it will cloud your vision for a few minutes.  When I use it really carefully I don't have any issues.  I've tried so many eye make up removers and this one is by far the best.  A little bit goes a long way too.  I really wouldn't let these reviews deter you..it's worth trying for yourself! You may love it, I definitely do :)

reviews.headline: Doesn't work at all
reviews.comments: I bought it for removing waterproof mascara and it doesn't at all

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: I read that this eye makeup remover could help remove eye makeup if you're having and eczema flare up. This was not the case. It burns. Left my eyes super red and swollen. Not your typical cerave quality product.

reviews.headline: Garbage - don't buy
reviews.comments: This garbage made my eyes sting like crazy and I couldn't see properly due to some weird film and grease in the formula. Plus it was ineffective, left half on the eye makeup on. Buy Clinique eye makeup remover instead, feels so much better and works 100 times more effectively.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Cleans my make up off no problems. Doesn't dry me out or burn eyes

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product, but it didn't do it for me. It was too thin, and I felt like I had to rub really hard to get my makeup off. I think this product would be better with a gel consistency.

reviews.headline: 1st time purchase
reviews.comments: I do not wear mascara every day but it works well when I do.  I prefer more of a cream but my regular brand has been discontinued and found this.  Gentle and effective.

reviews.headline: Amazing product for my eczema-prone eyes
reviews.comments: I am prone to getting eczema around my eyes when they get too dry or are exposed to a lot of irritants. Ive been using this product for months and love how well it removes my eye makeup and DOESNT cause an eczema flair. Would highly recommend

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: It has been a very long time since I used an eye makeup remover that has stung my eyes, but this really did, not just a bit, but a lot. It also made my vision cloudy and really didn't remove my eye makeup well (and I don't wear waterproof mascara). It's a shame since I like everything else I have tried from this brand.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product!
reviews.comments: This product is such an amazing makeup remover! I typically use Micellar water to try to get my makeup off, and it never took all my makeup off, or it would leave an oily residue on my face that I did not like. With this Cerave product, it does not leave and oily residue, and it does not feel heavy on my face! I have noticed improvements around my eyes using this product and would definitely would recommend this product! It gets all the makeup off without any harsh scrubbing and makes around your eyes soft, and smooth

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS PRODUCTT!!!
reviews.comments: I have been using Micellar water to take my eye makeup off, and I didn't like how it left an oily residue on my eyes and it often times didnt take all the makeup off. With this product it feels so lightweight on your face and doesnt leave an oily residue like the micellar water does! It also gets all the makeup off your eyes too! You also don't have to scrub harshly in order to get all the makeup off!

reviews.headline: i paid for a fancy bottle
reviews.comments: this eye makeup remover does not remove eye makeup any better than water. i shook the product well, as instructed. even after scrubbing - hard! - still no trace of makeup on the towel. if you're used to neutrogena or one of the generic equivalents stick to that bc it actually works

reviews.headline: Not the best
reviews.comments: Doesn't take off waterproof eyeliner very well.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This eye makeup remover one of the best I have ever used. There is no scent making this perfect for sensitive skin!

I have always wanted to try a milky eye makeup remover but, I had got the chance to until this product. This eye makeup remover is so gentle yet moisturizing it leaves my skin feeling and looking better than before I used it. I wear waterproof mascara and it removes the mascara with ease and I do not lose tons of lashes like with most makeup removers. This eye makeup remover gentle dissolves the mascara leaning my lashes not feeling crispy but, moisurized.

This makeup remover has three ceramides in it that dissolve the makeup and THEY WORK!!! You then add in the hyaluronic acid to bring moisture back to your skin you get one of the most effect, gentle cleaners I have ever used!

I wear contacts and I have zero issue using this while I wear my contacts which is amazing, as most things irratate them. I feel like this makeup remover has aided in my eyes looking the best they have in years and being more moisturized to help prevent or slow down aging. I also feel comfortable wearing mascara more often now because, this makeup remover takes the mascara off while sparing my eyelashes! This makeup remover is absolutely everything I could ask for!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this eye makeup remover

faceoff_negative.comments: I am a daily eye make-up wearer and was excited to try CeraVe's new Comforting Eye MakeUp Remover.  After shaking the product to mix it, I found the fragrance free product was gentle on the skin and did not leave an oily residue.  I like that the compact design means that it holds just about the same ounces (4) as my favorite remover (4.2), but at a shorter footprint, which is nice for users who lack counter space or use a medicine cabinet for toiletries.  I wear several coats of mascara and found that this product struggled a bit to fully remove my make-up.  It took several attempts and a bit of work, but the product eventually did remove my mascara.
faceoff_negative.headline: Gentle and Somewhat Effective
